projects.title: Customer Churn Prediction
projects.description: A machine learning model to predict which customers are likely to cancel their subscription based on historical data and behavior patterns.

useCases.title: Proactive Customer Retention
useCases.description: Identify at-risk customers before they cancel to enable targeted retention campaigns.

useCases.title: Personalized Offers
useCases.description: Generate personalized offers based on churn risk factors to increase retention.

projects.businessCase: Reducing customer churn by just 5% can increase profitability by 25-95%. This project aims to identify customers at risk of churning with 85% accuracy, allowing for targeted interventions.

projects.title: Inventory Optimization System
projects.description: An automated system that optimizes inventory levels across multiple warehouses to reduce costs while maintaining service levels.

useCases.title: Demand Forecasting
useCases.description: Predict future demand to optimize purchasing and stocking decisions.

useCases.title: Warehouse Optimization
useCases.description: Optimize product placement and distribution across warehouses.

useCases.title: Stockout Prevention
useCases.description: Reduce stockouts by maintaining optimal inventory levels.

projects.businessCase: Excess inventory ties up capital and increases storage costs, while stockouts lead to lost sales. This system aims to reduce inventory costs by 20% while maintaining or improving service levels.

projects.title: Customer Feedback Analysis
projects.description: An NLP-based system that analyzes customer feedback from multiple channels to identify trends, sentiment, and actionable insights.

useCases.title: Sentiment Analysis
useCases.description: Track customer sentiment over time and across different product lines.

useCases.title: Feature Prioritization
useCases.description: Identify most requested features and pain points to guide product development.

projects.businessCase: Understanding customer feedback at scale allows for data-driven product decisions and improved customer satisfaction. This project aims to process and analyze feedback from all channels in near real-time.
